AUTHOR: Original cog by: Will/tekulvw, modded by MakNCheese
DESCRIPTION: Earn some hella cred, Yo. Set an upvote and downvote emote using downemoji and upemoji, then add the corresponding reaction to a post to award the user upvotes/downvotes
SHORT: Use emotes to award people with upvotes/downvotes
NAME: StreetCred
INSTALL_MSG: StreetCred is a mod of Squid Plugin's Karma cog and uses some code from Flapjax's msgvote cog. All credit to tekulvw and flapjax (link to Squid-Plugins git: <https://github.com/tekulvw/Squid-Plugins> link to Flapjack Cogs git: <https://github.com/flapjax/FlapJack-Cogs>)
